summary: A killer begins to stalk the actors of a low budget horror film, killing them off one by one.
cast: Molly Ringwald|Frank Roberts|Kylie Minogue|Geoff Revell|Jessica Napier|Sarah Kants|Stephen Curry|Matthew Russell|Erika Walters|Cathy Adamek|Steve Greig|Sam Lewis|Paul Blackwell|Scott Heysen|Don Barker|Phyllis Burford|Dominic Pedlar|Holly Myers|Patrick Frost|Simon Bossell|Edwin Hodgeman|Peter Green|Caroline Mignon|Bronwen James|Huong Nguyen|Pamela Shaw|Tiriel Mora
title: Cut (Corten)
